casebody.data:
GEORGE F. DRISCOLL COMPANY v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45455] [104 C. Cls. 762;

328 U. S. —]

Government contract; decision of contracting officer as to plaintiff’s liability for repairs to broken water main final under the contract in suit. Petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court May 27, 1946.
